title: simplify the process of running tikv test in docker
body:

### What operating system and CPU are you using?

Linux
### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
Can run unittests of tikv in container by a simple cmd.
### What did happened?
Today we have to manually install dependencies like rust, protoc, epel-release, etc.
